title: Where is Disney's Headquarters? Main Office Location and Global Offices | Clay
snippet: The Walt Disney Company's main headquarters is located at 500 South Buena Vista Street in Burbank, California. This facility serves as the primary corporate office for the global entertainment conglomerate.

title: The Walt Disney Company Corporate Headquarters, Office Locations and Addresses | Craft.co
snippet: The Walt Disney Company is headquartered in Burbank, 500 S Buena Vista St, United States, and has 15 office locations.

title: Walt Disney Studios (Burbank) - Wikipedia
snippet: The Walt Disney Studios, located in Burbank, California, United States, serves as the corporate headquarters for the Walt Disney Company. The 51-acre (20.6 ha) studio lot also contains several sound stages, a backlot, and other filmmaking production ...
